main event: A UFO sighting was reported in DeSoto, Missouri on September 27, 1960, involving one object observed for 20 minutes.
interesting points: The observer initially thought the object was a star, but later realized it was something else., The object emitted white lights in the sky., The object was assumed to be quite distant yet appeared close or loud., There was no physical evidence or photographs associated with this sighting., The Air Force concluded that it was a possible satellite.
sighted object: one unidentified flying object emitting white lights
witness description: A civilian who reported observing the lights in the sky without any additional physical evidence.
